abstract: The DealBook column last Sunday, about chief executives who seek merger deals for their companies, misstated the status of a buyout that Richard D. Kinder, the chairman of Kinder Morgan Inc., led to acquire that company. It was completed in May; it is not pending.

lead_paragraph: The DealBook column last Sunday, about chief executives who seek merger deals for their companies, misstated the status of a buyout that Richard D. Kinder, the chairman of Kinder Morgan Inc., led to acquire that company. It was completed in May; it is not pending.

headline.main: Too Much Meddling When C.E.O.’s Go a-Courtin’?
